name: Tropic Keen
description:
Explore the first in a series of interactive "still lives." 

The idea is to make the compositions in Unity and paint them as actual objects in the week.

Tropic Keen uses assets from Captain Toad Treasure Tracker, and aims to turn the cute cartoon into something uncanny. A keen is both a cold wind, an insight, and a wail of grief for a dead person.

Use WASD to move around, and space to jump.
